sectionText: Section SJC: Soil Judging Contest.  The course meeting time will be arranged after everyone is enrolled.  The course will meet one 3 hour lab period per week, and require students to go to the soils judging contest, which generally occurs in mid-April (exact dates TBA). Pre-requisite: completion of NRES 276. Consent of the instructor required to enroll. E-mail Dr. Darmody at rdarmody@uiuc.edu for authorization.
